episodes.title: Why America is so good at producing cults
episodes.description:
Watch any documentary or listen to any podcast about cults and you might find one common thread. There are so many American cults. Why?

Professor Poulomi Saha explains why America is so good at producing cults, what we get wrong about cults, and why their popularity in media today points to a cultural yearning for an alternative way of life. 

*FEATURING:* 
Poulomi Saha, Associate Professor of English and co-Director of the Program in Critical Theory at UC Berkeley

#cults #cultdocumentary
@UCBerkeley

Fig. 1 explores big ideas —from science to culture to history to psychology — and the brilliant minds behind it.
